message: Let's get this started! I'll give you $100,000 and take the rest. You can't do better than that!

You think $700,000 is a good offer? I'll give you $580,000 and take the rest. It's a fair deal!

You think $600,000 is a good deal? I'll give you $550,000 and take the rest. It's getting close to the end, but I'm not giving in yet!
